text: Namespace searches work the appropriate nodes are selected. The problem is that the namespace declarations are missing from the returned elements. For example if you store a document foo then query /x:a/x:b (with x mapped to "example.com") foo will be returned and the namespace of b is lost. Store the following: foo then query /x:a/x:b (with x mapped to "example.com") foo will be returned. Calling getContentAsDOM() on the XMLResource returned throws an exception indicating that the prefix n has not been declared.
